sunlight: Full sun only if soil kept moist
description: Hardy begonia (Begonia grandis ‘Wildwood Premier’) is an amazing plant species for any garden. They produce beautiful dark-green foliage with intricate silver veining, paired with clusters of showy pink flowers with attractive yellow centers. They thrive in partial shade and can spread up to 3 feet, making them perfect for covering a large area. Hardy begonias are incredibly hardy in cooler climates, surviving temperatures as low as 40 degrees. In addition, they are fairly drought-tolerant and require minimal care. With its stunning colorful flowers and foliage, Hardy Begonia is sure to make any garden look beautiful.
